mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and member_status= 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into member values(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{address}, sysdate, sysdate, default, default )
mapper.select:
select id_type, board_title, modify_date, count_content from(select board_id id_type, board_title, board_modify_date modify_date, to_char(board_count) count_content from board where board_writer =#{id} and board_status='Y' order by board_id desc) where rownum <= 5
union
select * from(select board_type-3, board_title, reply_modify_date, reply_content from reply join board on (board_id = ref_board_id) where reply_writer = #{id} and reply_status='Y' order by reply_id desc) where rownum <= 5 order by id_type desc
mapper.update: update member set name =#{name}, nickName=#{nickName}, email=#{email}, gender=#{gender}, age=#{age}, phone=#{phone}, address=#{address}, update_date=sysdate where id = #{id}
